tasks.compile:all: deno task compile:macos && deno task compile:linux
tasks.compile:macos: deno compile --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --include src/agent-guide.md --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output dist/gtm-macos-x64 src/main.ts && deno compile --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --include src/agent-guide.md --target aarch64-apple-darwin --output dist/gtm-macos-arm64 src/main.ts
tasks.compile:linux: deno compile --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --allow-env --allow-run --include src/agent-guide.md --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output dist/gtm-linux-x64 src/main.ts
